description: This script initializes the database by creating seed data for restaurants and menu items in a food delivery platform backend.

classes.name: Restaurant
classes.description: Model representing a restaurant entity with name, description, and image URL.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Model representing a menu item linked to a restaurant, with details like name, description, price, and availability.

methods.name: run_seed()
methods.description: Function to populate initial restaurant and menu item data into the database, avoiding duplicates.
